getPosts: SELECT posts.id,  posts.author_id,  posts.title,  posts.category_id, users.username as author_name, categories.name as category_name FROM posts INNER JOIN users ON users.id=posts.author_id INNER JOIN categories on posts.category_id=categories.id
getReplies: SELECT replies.id, replies.post_id, replies.author_id, replies.text, users.username as author_name FROM replies INNER JOIN posts ON posts.id={id} INNER JOIN users ON replies.author_id=users.id
